website_summaries.verdict: The low-top Nike Air Max Tailwind IV is an old school sneaker that will surely catch the eyes of many people due to its bold colorways. It has an impressive modern look, which is available in a variety of tones, allowing it to go well with any outfit. Aside from the pair's top-notch design, the comfortability it offers is first-rate, providing its wearers long-lasting coziness despite being on their feet the entire day.
pros: A large percentage of reviewers commend the Nike Air Max Tailwind IV for the exceptional comfort it offers
Several wearers mention that the pair stands out and that when they put on the shoe, they get a lot of compliments
Plenty of the sneaker's end-users find the shoe stylish
The Air Max Tailwind IV is exceptionally durable, according to some buyers
A number of users give emphasis on the bold yet beautiful colorways of this pair
cons: Despite being generally good as it is, one suggests making the lacing system of the Nike Air Max Tailwind IV easier

customer_reviews.title: Dope!
customer_reviews.text: Super dope so far... I wasn’t expecting the quick delivery. And the quality and authenticity (from what I kno) is on point! They’re a little tight on the feet but I’ma cop sum more shoes from this company and see how the consistency goes.
customer_reviews.author: Sip

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Fit and look nice,if for ppl with wide feet these might be slightly tight
customer_reviews.author: omegasector fox

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable immediately
customer_reviews.text: Love fit, like look. Immediately started walking long miles in them with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: After 3 miles, the separation of air pockets numb the front outside quadrant of your feet resulting in a less than enjoyable run.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping so comfortable had these in high school so glad there back
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: They might charge you twice for one item
customer_reviews.text: They charge me twice waiting for them to give back smh but other then that is cool
customer_reviews.author: Millzz

customer_reviews.title: The Nike Air Max Tailwind IV Super Comfortable and Stylish!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fit perfect. As a woman I've always bought men shoes for A. Support. B. Comfort C. Style. I have flat feet with no arch so finding shoes especially running shoes has been tough that feel great as well as support my feet with each step. The design on these are awesome👍🏾 any contrast of blue is my favorite color. If they make a denim It'll be in my cart with the quickness😃 I highly recommend this shoe for a woman or man. I wanted to wear them more than once to give the best review possible. I will be purchasing more from the seller. They came as expected..right on time!
customer_reviews.author: Meac

customer_reviews.title: Nike support!
customer_reviews.text: They look and feel good, but a little snug! I normally wear a size 10 and with these I would recommend going a half size larger.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute shoes feel great.
customer_reviews.text: They fit great and feel good even after being on my feet all day. I got lots of compliments on them.
customer_reviews.author: J's Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: I returned them because the size I normally wear was extremely tight
customer_reviews.author: John Moss

customer_reviews.title: Alwas loved Nike
customer_reviews.text: Once again Nike makes a shoe for comfort and looks
customer_reviews.author: Chris69

customer_reviews.title: No cushion, hard surface walking feel
customer_reviews.text: This product cushioning is really bad, it has no cushion feels like standing on a hard surface. For $116 its a rip off. Highly not recommended
customer_reviews.author: me

customer_reviews.title: Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with the shoe and it was the cheapest I found anywhere else
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Wow i really like it ! Nice price and look amazing
customer_reviews.author: fadi
